DOC.brief_summary: To compare functional immune response 28 day administration one dose Men ACWY-CRM conjugate vaccine without adjuvant ( MenACWY-CRM ( Ad- ) ) Men ACWY polysaccharide ( PS ) vaccine
DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Novartis Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine Healthy Children Aged 12-59 Months .
DOC.criteria: healthy 12 < 60 month old child ; subject previously receive meningococcal vaccine subject serious acute chronic progressive disease
